SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT unionid) from we_store_code_count where source=1 ) as totalShopGuideScannNumber, ( SELECT count(DISTINCT external_userid) from we_customer where state in ( SELECT state from we_store_code )
) as customerTotalNumber, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT unionid) from we_store_code_count where date_format( create_time, '%y%m%d' ) = date_format( curdate(), '%y%m%d' ) AND source=1 ) as tdShopGuideScannNumber, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT unionid) from we_store_code_count where source=1 and date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') = date_format(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day),'%y%m%d') ) as ydShopGuideScannNumber, ( SELECT count(DISTINCT external_userid) from we_customer where state in ( SELECT state from we_store_code ) AND date_format(add_time,'%y%m%d') = date_format(curdate(),'%y%m%d') ) as ydCustomerNumber, ( SELECT count(DISTINCT external_userid) from we_customer where state in ( SELECT state from we_store_code ) AND date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') = date_format(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day),'%y%m%d') ) as tdCustomerNumber

SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT unionid) from we_store_code_count where source=2 ) as totalStoreGroupScannNumber,
( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT wgm.user_id) FROM we_group_member wgm where wgm.state in ( SELECT state from we_group_code ) ) as totalJoinGroupMemberNumber,
( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM we_group_member wgm where wgm.state in ( SELECT state from we_group_code ) and wgm.del_flag=1 ) as totalExitGroupMemberNumber,
( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT if(date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') = date_format(curdate(),'%y%m%d'),unionid,0)) from we_store_code_count where source=2 ) as tdStoreGroupScannNumber, ( SELECT COUNT(if(date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') = date_format(curdate(),'%y%m%d'),wgm.id,0)) FROM we_group_member wgm where wgm.state in ( SELECT state from we_group_code ) ) as tdJoinGroupMemberNumber, ( SELECT COUNT(if(date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') = date_format(curdate(),'%y%m%d'),wgm.id,0)) FROM we_group_member wgm where wgm.state in ( SELECT state from we_group_code ) and wgm.del_flag=1 ) as tdExitGroupMemberNumber, ( SELECT COUNT(if(date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') = date_format(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day),'%y%m%d'),id,0)) from we_store_code_count where source=2 ) as ydStoreGroupScannNumber, ( SELECT COUNT(if(date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') = date_format(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day),'%y%m%d'),wgm.id,0)) FROM we_group_member wgm where wgm.state in ( SELECT state from we_group_code ) ) as ydJoinGroupMemberNumber, ( SELECT COUNT(if(date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') = date_format(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day),'%y%m%d'),wgm.id,0)) FROM we_group_member wgm where wgm.state in ( SELECT state from we_store_code ) and wgm.del_flag=1 ) as ydExitGroupMemberNumber

SELECT a.store_name, a.customerNumber FROM ( SELECT wsc.store_name, ( SELECT COUNT( DISTINCT wc.external_userid ) FROM we_customer wc WHERE wc.state = wsc.state AND date_format( wc.add_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime} ) AS customerNumber FROM we_store_code wsc where wsc.del_flag=0 GROUP BY wsc.id ) a ORDER BY customerNumber DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT a.store_name, a.customerNumber FROM ( SELECT wsc.store_name, ( SELECT COUNT( DISTINCT wgm.user_id ) FROM we_group_member wgm WHERE wgm.state = wsc.state AND wgm.quit_scene IS NULL AND date_format( wgm.join_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime} ) AS customerNumber FROM we_store_code wsc where wsc.del_flag=0 GROUP BY wsc.id ) a ORDER BY customerNumber DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT wscc.store_code_id, date_format(wsc.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as createTime, wsc.area, wsc.store_name, COUNT(IF(date_format( wscc.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) BETWEEN #{weStoreCode.beginTime} AND #{weStoreCode.endTime},unionid,0)) as totalScannNumber, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT wc.external_userid) FROM we_customer wc WHERE wc.state=wsc.state AND date_format(wc.add_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) BETWEEN #{weStoreCode.beginTime} AND #{weStoreCode.endTime} ) as customerTotalNumber, COUNT(DISTINCT if(date_format(wscc.create_time,'%y%m%d') = date_format(curdate(),'%y%m%d'),unionid,0)) as tdScannNumber, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT wc.external_userid) FROM we_customer wc WHERE wc.state=wsc.state AND date_format(wc.add_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = date_format(curdate(),'%Y-%m-%d') ) as tdCustomerNumber FROM we_store_code_count wscc LEFT JOIN we_store_code wsc ON wscc.store_code_id=wsc.id WHERE wscc.source=1 and wsc.del_flag=0 and wsc.area = #{weStoreCode.area} and wsc.store_name = #{weStoreCode.storeName} and wsc.id=#{weStoreCode.storeCodeId} GROUP BY date_format(wsc.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT _date as dataTime,IFNULL(totalShopGuideScannNumber,0) as totalShopGuideScannNumber,IFNULL(customerTotalNumber,0) as customerTotalNumber FROM ( SELECT (@s := @s + 1 ) AS _index, STR_TO_DATE( DATE( DATE_SUB( DATE_FORMAT( #{weStoreCode.endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d' ), INTERVAL @s DAY )), '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS _date FROM information_schema.CHARACTER_SETS,( SELECT @s :=- 1 ) AS init WHERE @s < datediff( DATE_FORMAT( #{weStoreCode.endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d' ), DATE_FORMAT( #{weStoreCode.beginTime}, '%Y-%m-%d' )) ORDER BY _date ) tmp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(wscc.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS dateTime, count(DISTINCT unionid) as totalShopGuideScannNumber, (SELECT count(DISTINCT wc.external_userid) from we_customer wc where wc.state=wsc.state) as customerTotalNumber FROM we_store_code_count wscc LEFT JOIN we_store_code wsc ON wscc.store_code_id=wsc.id and wsc.del_flag=0 WHERE date_format(wscc.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{weStoreCode.beginTime} AND #{weStoreCode.endTime} AND wscc.source=1 and wsc.id=#{weStoreCode.storeCodeId} and wsc.area = #{weStoreCode.area} and wsc.store_name = #{weStoreCode.storeName} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(wscc.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ) tmpp on tmp._date=tmpp.dateTime
ORDER BY _date ASC

SELECT _date as dataTime,IFNULL(totalStoreGroupScannNumber,0) as totalStoreGroupScannNumber,IFNULL(totalJoinGroupMemberNumber,0) as totalJoinGroupMemberNumber, IFNULL(totalExitGroupMemberNumber,0) as totalExitGroupMemberNumber FROM ( SELECT (@s := @s + 1 ) AS _index, STR_TO_DATE( DATE( DATE_SUB( DATE_FORMAT( #{weStoreCode.endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d' ), INTERVAL @s DAY )), '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS _date FROM information_schema.CHARACTER_SETS,( SELECT @s :=- 1 ) AS init WHERE @s < datediff( DATE_FORMAT( #{weStoreCode.endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d' ), DATE_FORMAT( #{weStoreCode.beginTime}, '%Y-%m-%d' )) ORDER BY _date ) tmp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(wscc.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS dateTime, count(DISTINCT unionid) as totalStoreGroupScannNumber, (SELECT count(DISTINCT wgm.user_id) from we_group_member wgm where wgm.state=wgc.state) as totalJoinGroupMemberNumber, (SELECT count(DISTINCT wgm.user_id) from we_group_member wgm where wgm.state=wgc.state and wgm.del_flag=1) as totalExitGroupMemberNumber FROM we_store_code_count wscc LEFT JOIN we_store_code wsc ON wscc.store_code_id=wsc.id and wsc.del_flag=0 LEFT JOIN we_group_code wgc ON wgc.id=wsc.group_code_id WHERE date_format(wscc.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{weStoreCode.beginTime} AND #{weStoreCode.endTime} AND wscc.source=2 and wsc.id=#{weStoreCode.storeCodeId} and wsc.area = #{weStoreCode.area} and wsc.store_name = #{weStoreCode.storeName} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(wscc.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ) tmpp on tmp._date=tmpp.dateTime ORDER BY _date ASC
